doc.title: Efkarli sosyetede
doc.plot: Ruknettin is a lonesome and ill businessman, who is very wealthy. Arif and Semsi save him from committing suicide. He stays with them and is feeling better. The rich Naci, wants his daughter Selma to marry his partner Nihat, yet the girl doesn't want to do so. She tells her dad she will marry Ruknettin's son Tahsin. As Nihat's men want to abduct Selma, Arif and her friends save her. Arif takes the role of Tahsin. Selma and Tahsin fall in love. Arif's mother turns out to be Ruknettin's ex-wife. Arif doesn't forgive his father. Selma and Ruknettin try to convince him and they succeed. All of them start a happy life.
